text: Gaandhiyan is a 1999 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Sharvi, starring Thilakan and Srividya in the lead role. ==Cast== * Thilakan as Keraliyan * Vijayaraghavan as Captain Bharathan Menon * Siddique as S.P Jacob Cheriyan IPS * Priya Raman as Priya * Praveena as Divya Menon * MR Gopakumar as P.R Madhavanunni * Indrans as Udumbumchola Narayanan * Kollam Thulasi as Paniker *Subair as S.I Mathew Varghese * Spadikam George as Victor Manuran * Sudheesh as Praveen * Suvarna Mathew as Adv. Yamuna Rahim * Reena * Seenath * Nadirsha as Raheed * Srividya as Susanna John ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Gaandhiyan
